description:
Able to activate & deactivate tailscale connection which is really useful on devices without easy access to the command line, for example I've got it set as a game on my steamdeck so I can easily turn off my tailscale while in gaming mode. I've got this set on all my linux devices out of convenience.
My only detraction would be some buttons could be bigger and menus look a little dated, maybe that's intentional and it's all down to personal preference anyway

Great GUI utility for tailscale! Allows you too se all the options you need from its UI. Even if you typically use tailscale from the CLI anyway, even just having the connection indicator on the system tray is super helpful.
Permet d'avoir rapidement une vue de l'état de son tailscale
